org.matsim.core.utils.misc

Class ByteBufferUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matsim.core.utils.misc.ByteBufferUtils

  • public class ByteBufferUtils
extends Object
    Some helper methods to work with ByteBuffers.
    Author:
    mrieser

    • Constructor Detail

      • ByteBufferUtils

        public ByteBufferUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • putString

        public static void putString(ByteBuffer buffer,
                             String string)
        Writes the given String to the ByteBuffer. First writes the length of the String as int, then writes the single characters. The ByteBuffer's position is incremented according to the length of the String.
        Parameters:
        buffer -
        string -

      • getString

        public static String getString(ByteBuffer buffer)
        Reads a String from a ByteBuffer. Reads first an int for the length of the String, and then the corresponding number of characters. Increments the position of the ByteBuffer according to the length of the String.
        Parameters:
        buffer -
        Returns:
        the String at the buffer's current position

      • putObject

        public static void putObject(ByteBuffer buffer,
                             Serializable o)
        Writes the given Serializable to the ByteBuffer. First writes the length of the Serializable as int, then writes the single bytes of the serialized object. The ByteBuffer's position is incremented according to the length of the Serializable.

      • getObject

        public static Object getObject(ByteBuffer buffer)
        Reads a Object (Serializable) from a ByteBuffer. Reads first an int for the length of the Object, and then the corresponding number of bytes. Increments the position of the ByteBuffer according to the length of the object's byte array.
